title: Pixel 3 Battery Usage Going Nowhere
content: On my pixel 3 I have noticed fairly quickly.  I looked it up and it said to check the battery usage.  When I go into the battery usage I see about 4 or so apps using 3% which adds up to so where around 10%.  Even when I'm on 20% so where all my battery going? Is 70% of my battery going into background ussage?
